translation.text: Bankstown Line, Inner West & Leppington Line - Delays

Delays to some services from the City due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Circular Quay earlier. Please allow additional travel time, check indicator boards, listen to announcements and refer to transport apps as stopping patterns may change at short notice.

Delays to some services in both directions due to urgent track equipment repairs at North Sydney earlier. Customers are advised to allow additional travel time, check indicator boards and listen to announcements as stopping may change at late notice

Delays due to urgent track equipment repairs at North Sydney earlier. Please allow additional travel time, check indicator boards, listen to announcements and refer to transport apps as stopping patterns may change at short notice.

Major delays to some services due to high temperatures affecting track infrastructure and urgent signal equipment repairs at Yerrinbool. Trains are required to operate at a reduced speed in some locations. Please allow additional travel time.

Buses are replacing trains between Mt Victoria, Lithgow and Bathurst in both directions due to infrastructure damage caused by bushfires. 

With the exception of the 3:42AM Lithgow to Bathurst, the 5:47PM Sydney to Bathurst, the 5:46AM and the 10:17PM Bathurst to Sydney services. These 4 services will run as per timetable 

There is no forecast when the line can reopen. Please allow additional travel time and check transport apps for further details.

Delays to some services in both directions due to urgent track equipment repairs at North Sydney earlier. Customers are advised to allow additional travel time, check indicator boards and listen to announcements as stopping may change at late notice
Delays to some services due to high temperatures affecting track infrastructure.Customers are advised to allow additional travel time and refer to real-time apps for any changes.
Be heat smart and stay hydrated. If you feel unwell, don't risk boarding a train. Station staff can assist you.
due to a train requiring mechanical repairs earlier. Please allow additional travel time.
due to urgent track equipment repairs at North Sydney earlier
Delayed due to urgent track equipment repairs earlier.
due to an act of vandalism at Dapto earlier.
due to urgent track equipment repairs at North Sydney earlier
Cancelled due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Central

due to high temperatures affecting track infrastructure and urgent signal equipment repairs at Yerrinbool. Trains are required to operate at a reduced speed in some locations. Please allow additional travel time.
due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Hornsby
due to a freight train with mechanical problems at Wyee earlier
Asquith, Mt Colah, Mt Kuring-gai due to urgent track equipment repairs at North Sydney earlier
North Sydney due to urgent track equipment repairs at North Sydney earlier
Central due to urgent track equipment repairs at North Sydney earlier
Delayed due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Central
Cancelled due to a train requiring mechanical repairs earlier. Please listen to announcements and check real time apps for your next service.
The lift between platforms 1/2 and the concourse is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9379 4023.
The lift between the mezzanine level to concourse and to platforms 3/4 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9379 4432.
The lift between the concourse and Platforms 3/4 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9224 4102.
The lift between the concourse and platforms 2/3 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9752 8891.
The lift between the concourse and platforms 3/4 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9851 7431.
The lift between the concourse and platform 1 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9563 7440.
The lift between the concourse and Plough Inn Road is temporarily out of service. For assistance, ask staff or call 4625 2362.
The lift between the concourse and Railway Street is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask staff or call 9851 7243.

Due to an unplanned IT outage, indicator boards are currently unavailable or may display incorrect information. Trains continue to run. Listen to announcements, see station staff for assistance and check real time apps for your next service.

From Thursday 2 until Saturday 25 January, the Southern Tunnel at Central Station will be temporarily closed due to Sydney Metro works. To access platforms 4-23 please follow signs and use the Suburban Tunnel or the Northern Concourse. For more information about Sydney Metro works, visit sydneymetro.info

Due to station maintenance works, the pedestrian ramp between Richmond Platform 2 and the concourse is closed. If you are unable to use the stairs, a shuttle bus to and from East Richmond station will be available.   For further assistance, please see station staff or call 9851 7248.

The public toilets at St James Station are closed while major works are taking place. Public toilets are located at the Elizabeth Street entrance to the right and in Hyde Park through the Macquarie Street tunnel up the stairs to the right. We apologise for any inconvenience.

New Metro Platforms are being constructed on platforms 1 & 2 at Sydenham Station. T3 Bankstown Line services to the City operate from platform 3 & T3 Bankstown Line services to Lidcombe and Liverpool operate from platform 4. Platform 4, 5 & 6 upgrade works - A new Metro concourse is also being constructed at the Northern end of the station. While the concourse is being installed, please board and alight from the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. If you need help, please see staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info
